name: Deadreef the Ephemeral Fish
text: When this card is Summoned: You can send 1 Fish monster from your Deck to the GY, except "Deadreef the Ephemeral Fish". You can banish this card from your GY, then target 3 Fish monsters in your GY; shuffle them into the Deck, then draw 1 card. You can only use each effect of "Deadreef the Ephemeral Fish" once per turn.
